⚠️ **This is a feature branch for Skeleton v0.1.x**

- Adds the initial web entry structure for new projects
- Not intended for production use
- Branch is unstable; API and structure may change

## Purpose

This branch implements the **initial web entry structure** as part of the ongoing Skeleton development:

- `web/` folder created
- `index.php` — HTTP entry point
- `favicon.ico` and `robots.txt` — basic web assets
- `.htaccess` — Apache config
- `web.config` — IIS config

It serves as a starting point for all future Skeleton features and project bootstrapping.

## Stability Guarantee

❌ No backward compatibility guarantee  
❌ Structure and file content may change  
❌ Intended only for contributors and early testing

## Versioning

The feature branch is aligned with **Skeleton v0.1.x**:

- Pre-release feature
- Future releases will stabilize the structure
- Semantic versioning applies when merged into the main develop branch

## Branch Workflow

- Branch created from `develop` branch of Skeleton
- Pull requests should target `develop` for integration
- All later features or fixes based on this branch should branch off from here

## Usage

Developers can use this branch to:

1. Verify initial web entry structure setup
2. Start building HTTP-based project scaffolding
3. Test integration with Skeleton core
